member.name: AUDIOCLIENT_ACTIVATION_TYPE
member.summary: Specifies the activation type for an structure passed into a call to .

member.name: AUDIOCLIENT_ACTIVATION_TYPE.AUDIOCLIENT_ACTIVATION_TYPE_PROCESS_LOOPBACK
member.summary: Process loopback activation, allowing for the inclusion or exclusion of audio rendered by the specified process and its child processes. For sample code that demonstrates the process loopback capture scenario, see the Application Loopback API Capture Sample.
